description: This file implements management functions for SlapEnvController, including retrieval, addition, deletion of containers, and bulk removal of all containers within the environment. It manages object containers via a hash table and provides functions to manipulate container objects identified by name or object handle.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapEcoGetSlapContainer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * container_name)
methods.description: Retrieves the container object matching the specified container name from the environment's hash table, locking the table during the search.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoAddSlapContainer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hContainer)
methods.description: Adds a container object to the environment's hash table, calculates the hash index based on the container name, and updates the default container pointer if applicable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoDelSlapContainer1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * container_name)
methods.description: Deletes a container object from the hash table by matching container name, unlocking the table after removal, and clearing the default container if needed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoDelSlapContainer2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hContainer)
methods.description: Deletes a container object from the hash table by object reference, unlocking the table after removal, and clearing the default container pointer if applicable.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoDelAllSlapContainers(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Removes all container objects from the environment, releasing all resources and resetting the default container pointer.
